import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react'; import Spinner from '../layout/Spinner'; import Repos from '../repos/Repos'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const User = ({ user, loading, getUser, getUserRepos, repos, match }) =>{ useEffect(() => { // use instead of didmount getUser(match.params.login) getUserRepos(match.params.login) });// no brackets they fixed it ! const{ name, avatar_url, location, bio, blog, login, html_url, followers, following, public_repos, public_gists, hireable, company, }= user if ( loading ) return ; return( Back To Search Hireable: {' '} {hireable ? ( ) : () }

 ); } User.propTypes = { loading: PropTypes.bool, user: PropTypes.object.isRequired, repos: PropTypes.array.isRequired, getUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired, getUserRepos: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default User;
